description: yeehaa is a seasoned professional in digital innovation and technology strategy with extensive leadership experience in Europe's top tech firms. He excels in software development, data analytics, and project management. His work, including the blog 'Across Space And Time' and course 'Groom Your Ecosystem,' showcase his expertise in ecosystem architecture, modern organizational structures, and tech-driven strategic vision.
blurb: Ecosystems traditionally involve biotic and abiotic interactions within a geographic space and time. Modern usage transcends this, describing decentralized human organizations that require new models and skills.
